\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Represent a segment of memory in device memory (used by custom allocator) It is placed in two chained list\+:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item the list of all chunk in device memory
\item the list of free chunk in device memory 
\end{DoxyItemize}
